content.prompt: While the degree of naturalism varies in the Ikenga shrine figures used by the Igbo peoples, one traditional characteristic all Ikenga share is

choices.label: oversized eyes, intended to suggest extraordinary insight
an exaggerated navel, intended to mark connections to ancestors
a cavity in the belly, intended to contain magical substances
horns rising above the head, intended to symbolize power

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Explain why a specific work of art (or group of related works of art) demonstrates continuity and/or change within an artistic tradition, style, or practice.
